articles.title: Man United set new club record despite Arsenal stalemate - The World Game
articles.description: Manchester United set a new club record of 18 away Premier League games unbeaten as they held on for a 0-0 draw at depleted Arsenal on Sunday (AEDT).

articles.description: Tim Paine has leapt to the defence of Justin Langer and urged him not to change his methods amid reports of a dressing room rift over the intensity of his coaching methods.
